name: Revenge of the Tomato
overview: There have been sightings of a load of floating tomatoes! What!? It turns out that the tomatoes may look fruity enough to eat, but these mutant tomatoes are in fact very deadly. The people in the countryside, towns and cities are panicking and screaming, running for their lives. Unfortunately not everybody made it. The poor victims got sucked into the tomato, which lead to the mega tomato. It's food source was, of course, humans and spaceships. You have been assigned on a top secret mission is to strap yourself into the latest in sky technology and blast those tomatoes and make your way to the mega tomato while saving the humans stranded on the rooftops. Game was created as part of the RGCD C64 16KB Cartridge Game Development Competition 2013 and also in Commodore Free #067.
